tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trends (
    trend_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_id UUID,
    trend_name VARCHAR(50),
    trend_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES viewers(viewer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE viewership_data (
    viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    viewing_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age_group VARCHAR,
    income_level INT,
    education_level VARCHAR,
    occupation VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE viewer_demographics (
    viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    occupation VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE viewer_activity (
    viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    watched_duration INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE show_data (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE viewer_ratings (
    viewer_id INT,
    show_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (viewer_id, show_id)
)

CREATE TABLE viewership_data (
    viewership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    show_title VARCHAR,
    duration INT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE viewership_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    show_title VARCHAR,
    duration INT,
    rating FLOAT
);
